Hello, I'm Neth!

Web Developer Podcaster Blogger

I produce, edit, and co-host a podcast called SNEScapades, a chronological journey through the North American Super NES library four games at a time. It comes out weekly and we keep it pretty clean. If video game history is your thing, give us a listen.

By the way, I'm looking for a job. Feel free to contact me if you think I'd be a good fit, or if you just want to say hi.
